channel.title: Right click text with the lunar on my client!
channel.description:
How can i change what this says... as in "cast vengeance" instead of "cast on..ice barrage"?
[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/vengeanced.jpg[/img]
Thanks

item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

The Moose:

Im 100% (almost) positive that this is client-side so even if you changed it (im guessing in a way similar to item masking?) you could still only see difference whilst in client.

you can only get on my server using the client anyways because the port is a random 5 digit’s and when you log in it sends a packet to log it

item.title: Right click text with the lunar on my client!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:17, topic:123584”]I made my own lunar tab… It’s not too hard guys. Just L2Java. And all he did was change the cases/spellids for the Ancients Tab to work with his custom Lunar Magicks. I might try this too, and the only other thing he did was change the sprites for the ancients tab.

I_Own_PKing - I’m going to try and make this and see how it works out too. I just need to know a few things:

  1. If I set my Music Tab to load the Ancients Tab, would the Ancient Magicks still work and be exactly the same as the real ancients tab? Because I would want to have two tabs loaded off of the ancient magicks one, one having ancient magicks, the other having lunar. Is that possible?

  2. Did you edit sprites or add your own? :P[/quote]

1 made my own spells including vengence, heal groups and hit the damage you heal, vengeance other and no it will use the same ancients even if you do it on music tab :s

but unless you can code good spells its not worth wasting the ancients… if you try please make a back-up of your server[br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2007, 12:38:50 PM[/size][hr]so no one can help :s

Read full topic
item.source: Right click text with the lunar on my client!

item.title: Right click text with the lunar on my client!
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

I made my own lunar tab… It’s not too hard guys. Just L2Java. And all he did was change the cases/spellids for the Ancients Tab to work with his custom Lunar Magicks. I might try this too, and the only other thing he did was change the sprites for the ancients tab.

I_Own_PKing - I’m going to try and make this and see how it works out too. I just need to know a few things:

  1. If I set my Music Tab to load the Ancients Tab, would the Ancient Magicks still work and be exactly the same as the real ancients tab? Because I would want to have two tabs loaded off of the ancient magicks one, one having ancient magicks, the other having lunar. Is that possible?

  2. Did you edit sprites or add your own?

Read full topic

item.title: Right click text with the lunar on my client!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“kepoly, post:14, topic:123584”]i own i can help you but could you tell me how you got lunar…

ok go into cleint.java search ice barrage its in white so it would be like @whi@ice barrage

find that and change it.keep finding ice barrage and changing[/quote]

dont be soooo dumb? its not thats how you change what it says not when you right click it will still be ice barrage…

ALSO i coded lunar because im not someone who goes around asking for either special attacks or other stuff that takes hours because people cant be bothered to learn java.
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2007, 09:34:23 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Called enzo, post:15, topic:123584”]He uses normal magic also u n00b… lol … (ancients i meen) he dont removed all ancients…[/quote]

yer i did remove the ancients for lunar but i coded all the spells my self[br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2007, 09:35:02 AM[/size][hr]Anyone help?

Read full topic
